dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Manage your wishlists and view invitations
dashboard.createFirstWishlist: Create your first wishlist to get started
dashboard.localDevMode: ðŸš§ LOCAL DEVELOPMENT MODE - Using Local Supabase

createWishlist.title: Create New Wishlist
createWishlist.description: Give your wishlist a name and description
createWishlist.enablePriceDescription: Allow setting price ranges for items
createWishlist.enablePriorityDescription: Allow setting priority levels on items

createWishlistDialog.title: Create New Wishlist
createWishlistDialog.description: Give your wishlist a name and description

auth.welcomeBack: Welcome back! Sign in to manage your wishlists
auth.createAccount: Create an account to start making wishlists
auth.signInDescription: Enter your email and password to access your wishlists
auth.signUpDescription: Create your account to start building and sharing wishlists
auth.noAccount: Don't have an account? Sign up
auth.hasAccount: Already have an account? Sign in
auth.passwordRequirement: Password must be at least 6 characters long
auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters

publicWishlist.requiresShareLink: This wishlist requires a valid share link to access
publicWishlist.invalidShareLink: The share link is invalid, expired, or has been deactivated
publicWishlist.noItemsYet: No items in this wishlist yet
publicWishlist.claimDescription: Let others know you're getting this gift. Please provide your name so the wishlist owner knows who's getting what.
publicWishlist.howItWorksStep1: Click "I'll get this!" on any item you want to buy as a gift. This reserves the item so others won't choose the same thing.
publicWishlist.howItWorksStep2: Your name will be shown to the wishlist owner so they know who's getting what gift, but it stays hidden from other visitors.
publicWishlist.changeOfMind: Changed your mind? Contact the wishlist admin to cancel your reservation.

manageWishlist.title: Manage Items
manageWishlist.settingsDescription: Configure your wishlist details and what information is included in items
manageWishlist.wishlistDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe what this wishlist is for (optional)
manageWishlist.noItemsYet: No items yet. Add your first wish!

addItemDialog.title: Add Wishlist Item
addItemDialog.description: Add something you'd like to receive

inviteDialog.title: Invite Admin
inviteDialog.description: Invite someone to help manage your wishlist and share it with others

deleteDialog.title: Delete Item
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{{title}}"? This action cannot be undone.

deleteWishlistDialog.title: Delete Wishlist
deleteWishlistDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{{title}}"? This will permanently delete all items and cannot be undone.

removeInvitationDialog.title: Remove Invitation
removeInvitationDialog.description: Are you sure you want to remove the invitation for {{email}}? They will no longer be able to accept this invitation.

removeAdminDialog.title: Remove Admin
removeAdminDialog.description: Are you sure you want to remove {{email}} as an admin? They will lose access to admin features for this wishlist.
removeAdminDialog.shareLinkWarning: Warning: This will also permanently delete all active share links for this wishlist. People who have the link will no longer be able to access the wishlist.

untakeItemDialog.title: Untake Item
untakeItemDialog.description: Are you sure you want to mark "{{title}}" as available again? This will remove the claim by {{takenBy}} and make the item available for others to take.

messages.invitationCreated: Invitation created! Link copied to clipboard
messages.adminRemovedAndShareLinksDeleted: Admin removed and all share links deleted. The wishlist is no longer publicly accessible.
messages.invitationAccepted: Invitation accepted! You are now an admin for this wishlist.
messages.noAdminAccess: You do not have admin access to this wishlist
messages.shareLinkActive: This wishlist has an active share link and editing is restricted
messages.editingRestricted: Editing and deleting items is disabled when a share link is active
messages.editDisabledTooltip: Editing is disabled while wishlist has an active share link
messages.deleteDisabledTooltip: Deleting is disabled while wishlist has an active share link

acceptInvitation.invitedToManage: You've been invited to help manage a wishlist as an admin.
acceptInvitation.asAdminYouCan: As an admin, you'll be able to:
acceptInvitation.seeItemsTaken: See which items have been taken and by whom
acceptInvitation.shareWishlistLink: Share the wishlist link with others
acceptInvitation.signInToAccept: Please sign in or create an account to accept this invitation.
acceptInvitation.afterSignInInfo: After signing in, you'll see the invitation on your dashboard where you can accept it.

adminWishlist.itemsClaimedByGuests: Items that have been claimed by guests
adminWishlist.noItemsTakenYet: No items have been taken yet
adminWishlist.accessDenied: Access denied or wishlist not found
adminWishlist.availableItemsDescription: Items that haven't been taken yet

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Manage your personal information and account settings
profile.nameHelpText: Your name helps others identify whose wishlist they're viewing and shows who claimed which items.

theme.title: Theme Settings
theme.description: Customize the appearance of your application

onboarding.welcomeDescription: Let's get you set up. Please tell us your name so others can identify you when claiming items.
onboarding.nameHelpText: This name will be shown to wishlist owners when you claim items as gifts.
onboarding.welcomeComplete: Welcome! Your profile is now complete.
onboarding.errorSaving: Failed to save your name. Please try again.
